text: Zisas Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuin mba gumgi gu mbigi ga suaŋgia thugim, gumgi mbari maaŋ kav, mbe Gariri gumgir hɨgi bigen ana neŋgi. Mbe mba bigen ana neŋgap khaŋ ana nzuai, “Gariri gumgi mbari, mbe Fhe Bakɨme nzuav sɨgi shogav shama mbuav kim, Pairat won ntari ga mbui gɨɨtɨvi ga sarigim, mbe vov, mbe shogi, mbe vɨzi siav, mba Fhe Bakɨme nzuav shogi sɨgi vɨzi tɨ suagi.” 13.1 Mba Gariri gumgi, mbe mba tɨvar mbe muuŋgi, mbe Garirin kav, mba Fhe Bakɨme nzuav shama mbuav kim, mbe shogim, mbe vhɨzgi fhuvara. Mbe Fhe Bakɨmen suaŋgi tɨva zɨn vov, mbe nda vov, Zerusareman Fhe Bakɨme nzuav shama mbuav sɨgi ga mpov kim, mbe mba tɨvar mbe muuŋgi.
